title: Doom Axe
content:
Doom Axe Uncommon 1~12 Damage 1d12 Slashing Edge of Terror: Each strike fills target with a chilling dread that prevents it from regaining hit points. Undead creatures also get disadvantage on attack rolls. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Bringer of that which it is. Greataxe Two-Handed 3.15 65

Edge of Terror: Each strike fills target with a chilling dread that prevents it from regaining hit points. Undead creatures also get disadvantage on attack rolls.

Proficiency with this weapon
